Oct. 3, 2015 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Combined Third & Fourth Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Combined Third & Fourth Section) 35 Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-combined-5780
None
Memorial Hall, Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Placed Fourth Section Band: Ystradgynlais Best Instrumentalist: David Rees (flugel) Abertillery & District Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100. 7 bands competed.
Oct. 5, 2015, 11:55 p.m. July 4, 2020, 10:11 p.m.
1 Abertillery & District Youth Joshua Ruck Visions [Price]
2 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Jeff Hutcherson The Pacemakers
3 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Alice Jones
4 Upper Rhondda Brass Band Jake Pritchard A Saddleworth Festival Overture
5 Newport Borough Band Robin Hackett Olympus
6 Oakdale Silver Band Kerry Bowden The Haslemere Suite
7 Ystradgynlais Public Band Christian Jenkins Shakespearean Rhapsody
